item.description:
Team,
We've got two folks on the agenda for this meeting:


  • Mark True, operations engineer here at Aprigo, will talk about how does Aprigo utilizes AWS as part of our development process as well as Data Center operation. He will cover: Business objectives, processes, tools etc
  • Nate Aune will talk about how jazkarta are using user-data scripts with the Alestic and official Ubuntu AMIs for their PondCMS service. http://jazkarta.com/p...

group.name: The Boston Amazon Web Services Meetup Group

item.name: June Boston AWS meet-up
